text: Yet he was silent when specifically pressed to confess that he had killed his wife and his brother.
transcription_expl: j˘ˈɛt hˈi˘ wˈɑ˘z sˈaɪləːn˘tˑ w˘ˈɛ˘n s˘p˘ə˘sˈɪfɪkli˘ pːrˈɛˑstː t˘ˈu kənfˑˈɛːsː ðˈæ˘t hˈi hˈæ˘d kˈɪld hˈɪz wˈaɪfˑ ən˘d hˈɪˑz bˑrˈʌˑðˑər.
transcription_impl: jˈɛt hˈi wˈɑz sˈaɪlənt wˈɛn spəsˈɪfɪkli prˈɛst tˈu kənfˈɛs ðˈæt hˈi hˈæd kˈɪld hˈɪz wˈaɪf ənd hˈɪz brˈʌðər.
